item.description:
Artu ( www.artuboston.com) proved to be a popular choice for lunch in January 2010, as 22 NEEM members attended. So we will visit during Restaurant Week for dinner. The 3-course menu has 4 appetizers, 4 entrees and 2 desserts to choose from. ( http://www.artuboston.com/restaurantweekaug11.pdf  ) The price for 3 courses is $33 (plus tax, tip and drinks). You may also order off their extensive regular menu.

Join us in the lounge as you enter the restaurant, from 6:00-7:00 for drinks and mingling. Artu is at 6 Prince St. As you walk down the right side of Hanover Street from the Greenway, take a right onto Prince St.

Seating is limited, so if you RSVP 'Yes,' please cancel if you can't make it. Hope you can join us.
item.name: Artu-Restaurant Week Dinner
